episodes.title: SUNN Speakers at Rajneeshpuram: My Teacher's Cult Sound Gig
episodes.description:
Quick story about the time my audio engineering teacher rented out SUNN speakers to the Rajneeshpuram cult compound in Oregon.

For those who don't know: Rajneeshpuram was a cult community in rural Oregon in the 1980s led by Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh. They threw massive parties and events. They also poisoned people, attempted murder, and committed the largest bioterror attack in US history.

My teacher did live sound work in Oregon and at one point rented SUNN speakers to them for their events before everyone knew how dangerous they actually were.

Just a weird piece of Oregon music history that connects to the SUNN amp conversation. Sometimes gear ends up in strange places.

If you want the full Rajneeshpuram story, there's a great documentary called "Wild Wild Country" on Netflix.

THE LOST STATE SHOW
